::Shredder::

"Well, you could monitor the remaining scanners, or you could even patroll 
the perimiter. We could be attacked, you know. Just don't go running off to 
get yourself killed."

Shredder turns around, looking at the blown up Destron base. "Now let's get 
to work," he says, walking off.
